name: Knives (itch)
description:
A sharp knife and a sharp eye is enough to hit your target.

You think so? Play the game to find out.

Rules:

1. Hold and drag your finger to shoot a knife.

2.  Want to know  more? Why don't you play the game!

Go get it NOW

I don't own this music. The music is taken from the website below.
